name: RemedyMOD
description:
Modification of Remedyforce console UI on Salesforce platform. 
Intended for internal company use only.
additional_info:
Supported browser: Chrome 60+

Detailed list of changes: 
- corrected console window alignment
- slimmed ticker
- removed sections top-menu
- removed sections titles
- reduced inputs grid padding
- changed inputs borders and background
- aligned inputs width
- changed cursor over tooltips
- reduced details grid padding
- enlarged details buttons
- enlarged radio inputs size
- removed links to top
- slimmed footer
